channel.title: Oakley Whisker Prescription OX3107 – Men’s Designer Glasses
channel.description: Oakley started out as one man working in his garage with only $300 start up money. The company is now worth several million and is globally recognised. Owned by Italian firm, Luxottica, after a takeover in 2007 – the company also boast Vogue and Ray Ban to their name, Oakley are now a worldwide designer [...]
